remarks: An inference version of the transitive laws for implication ~ luk-1 . Copy of ~ syl with a different proof.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Dec-2018.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-syl.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
wl-syl.2 $e |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
wl-syl $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
